programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Sonya is driven to the edge and sorely tempted when she sees some bottles of wine left over from the wake. Terese loses her trust in Piper and lays down the law.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: John is diagnosed as having a brain tumour, Ash tries to mend fences with VJ, and Justin comes to a heartbreaking decision after meeting Nina.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: FIA World Rally Championship Highlights
programme.desc: The Rally de France. Action from the fourth round of the season, which took place on tarmac roads on the island of Corsica. Home favourite Sebastien Ogier won the opening race of this campaign in Monte-Carlo, with Finland's Jari-Matti Latvala taking the honours in Sweden and Northern Irishman Kris Meeke winning round three in Mexico. Defending champion Ogier topped the standings after finishing on the podium in both of those subsequent races.(n)

programme.title: Inside
programme.desc: Cameras take a look inside the 11th-century church, partially designed by Christopher Wren. It has been the final resting place for 17 monarchs, played host to the coronation of Queen Elizabeth II in 1953, and has hosted 16 royal weddings, including Prince William's marriage to Catherine Middleton in 2011.(n)

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.sub-title: Yorkshire: A Year in the Wild: Winter.
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on. Cameras also follow the progress of many short-eared owls that land on the moors after the long flight over the North Sea from northern Europe. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth II: Crown and Country
programme.desc: Documentary looking back at the Queen's reign, from her ascension to the throne in 1952, following the death of her father George VI, to her Diamond Jubilee celebrations. This updated version celebrates her becoming Britain's longest reigning monarch, and archive footage and interviews help tell the story of a monarch who has steered the royal family into a new millennium and beyond. She has overseen Britain's transformation into a multicultural nation, travelled farther than any other Queen in history, and shared the world stage with countless historic figures along the way.(n)

programme.title: Tony Robinson: Coast to Coast
programme.desc: The actor explores the Yorkshire Dales and in the town of Hawes, meets the team who came together to save local production of Wensleydale cheese by organising a management buy-out of the creamery after the parent company closed it down. Tony also visits the market town of Leyburn on calf auction day, before heading to Aysgarth Falls, a triple flight of waterfalls carved out of the River Ure. In the Swaledale valley, Tony joins in rehearsals of the Muker Silver Band, discovering the origins of this traditional brass outfit.(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: In Joel Schumacher's taut thriller, told in real time, cynical, smarmy PR man Stu Shepard picks up a ringing phone in a booth in a busy New York street to find a killer on the line. Armed with a high-powered sniper's rifle, the anonymous caller soon proves his prowess and presents Shepard with a choice: convince the police of his story before they shoot him or drop the phone and be shot. His only hope lies in self-abasement and facing up to the truths of his life(n)

programme.title: Traders
programme.desc: A man's business goes under, threatening to derail his posh existence. In a desperate attempt to keep his life as he knows it, he agrees to cash out his entire life savings and put it all on the line in a diabolical, winner-takes-all fight to the death(n)

programme.title: Love and a Bullet
programme.desc: Gun-blazing action and satirical wit nicely blend together in this urban crime drama. Rapper-actor Treach (of the group Naughty by Nature) plays Malik Bishop, a street gangsta who has become a hip and elite hit man. Bishop is hired to slay his boss's innocent girlfriend, but he begins to ruminate on his shady lifestyle when he falls in love with his target. Kent Masters King, Freez Luv(n)

programme.title: Sunshine State
programme.desc: Like Lone Star, Sunshine State is a John Sayles film in which a multitude of characters struggle with the past, both recent and ancient -- both family history and the traumatic past of the land itself. It's set on the fictional Plantation Island in Florida, the history of which is based upon Amelia Island, where the film was actually shot. Lincoln Beach, the once thriving black community on the island, is based on the region's American Beach. Sunshine State portrays a relentless onslaught of real estate developers in the area. Desiree Perry (Angela Bassett, who was also in Sayles' Passion Fish and City of Hope) has returned to Florida for the first time since being sent away as a pregnant teen. She nervously brings her husband, Reggie (James McDaniel of NYPD Blue), an anesthesiologist, to meet her estranged mother, Eunice (Mary Alice). Eunice has recently taken in a troubled teenaged relative, Terrell (newcomer Alexander Lewis). Eunice's friend, Dr. Lloyd (Bill Cobbs), is trying to rally the Lincoln Beach community to slow development. Marly Temple (Edie Falco of The Sopranos, here playing a Southerner) runs the motel owned by her ailing father (Ralph Waite of Waltons fame), but has little interest in the business, and the developers are pressuring her to get her father to sell. She's in the process of ending a relationship with the local golf pro (Marc Blucas from TV's Buffy the Vampire Slayer), when a rather mercenary landscape architect, Jack Meadows (Timothy Hutton), catches her eye. Meanwhile, Francine Pickney (Mary Steenburgen) is so busy organizing the town's cheesy Buccaneer Days festival that she doesn't realize that her husband, Earl (Gordan Clapp, also of NYPD Blue and a Sayles regular) is suicidal. As usual, Sayles wrote, directed, and edited the film, with Maggie Renzi producing(n)

programme.title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
programme.desc: Sean Connery stars in this all-action adventure as Allan Quatermain, called out of retirement in Kenya to help the government avert a world war being fermented by master criminal The Phantom. Quatermain gathers together a top team; Dorian Gray, Captain Nemo, Mina Harker and The Invisible Man are among those recruited, each with a spectacular skill. From Venice to the wastes of Mongolia, the team face perils and death in their desperate race against time. Stephen Norrington's fantasy, set in an alternative Victorian world, is frantic fun-filled action from start to finish, with the witty script matching awesome special effects(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate one of the UK's most-notorious hauntings(n)

programme.title: Enough
programme.desc: On the run from an abusive husband, a young mother begins to train herself to fight back(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg gives a dynamic performance in the title role, a grieving cop out to avenge the murder of his family. As his investigation evolves he hooks up with an assassin (Mila Kunis), and events take a scary, supernatural turn for the worse. Rapper Ludacris costars with Beau Bridges. Directed by John Moore, the film is based on a popular video game(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: In 1974 scientists mixed extraterestrial DNA with human DNA to create a new species. The creature, now a young girl, escapes and mutates into a beuatiful young woman intent on seducing unknowing men(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A stolen painting and a crooked land deal intertwines the destinies of a Russian mobster, a London gangster and a junkie punk rocker in writer-director Guy Ritchie's stylish caper film(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Frustrated corporate analyst Wesley Gibson finds out that the father who abandoned him as a child was actually a professional killer who belonged to an ancient organization called The Fraternity, and he has just been murdered. Sexy assassin Fox (Angelina Jolie) brings him into the organization, where he learns that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities. As he gets ready to face a dangerous enemy, he begins to suspect things may not be what they seem(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: William Peter Blatty's Oscar-winning adaptation of his bestseller about a child possessed by a demon(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A supernatural being that can only be seen when the lights go out attacks a family and one of them has to step up to protect the others(n)

programme.title: Suicide Kings
programme.desc: In this hip crime drama, a spoiled rich teen's (Henry Thomas) sister is abducted, and he and his punk friends decide to kidnap an ex-mob boss (Christopher Walken) as a negotiating tool. But the wily mobster turns the tables on his bungling captors. Denis Leary, Sean Patrick Flanery, Jay Mohr, Jeremy Sisto, Laura San Giacomo(n)

programme.title: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: On the streets they call cash dead presidents. And that's just what a Vietnam veteran is after when he returns home from the war only to find himself drawn into a life of crime. With the aid of his fellow vets he plans the ultimate heist -- a daring robbery of an armored car filled with unmarked U.S. currency!(n)

programme.title: The Glimmer Man
programme.desc: Action thriller about a government agent who is asked to resume his old role as a police officer to help catch a serial killer preying on the citizens of LA. Teamed with a local homicide detective, the agent discovers that the killer seems to know a lot about his past(n)

programme.title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
programme.desc: Comic road movie starring Wesley Snipes and Patrick Swayze about three New York drag queens who win a trip to Hollywood and set out on a life-changing journey across the USA(n)

programme.title: Riding in Cars With Boys
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore plays a teenage single mother who tries to overcome the feeling she's made the wrong choices in life(n)

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: Well-meaning but witless ex-con 'H' McDunnough causes pandemonium when he steals one of Arizona's famous newborn quintuplets for his infertile wife. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz, in this hysterical, fast-paced mockumentary(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: In a future where the polar ice caps have melted and most of Earth is underwater, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw smokers, and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land(n)

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, who dazzled as Jim Morrison in "The Doors" and Doc Holliday in "Tombstone," adds another outstanding real-life characterization to his résumé---John Holmes. This film chronicles the porn star's suspected involvement in a 1981 homicide that left four of his 'friends' dead. The first-rate supporting cast includes Lisa Kudrow, Eric Bogosian, Dylan McDermott and Ted Levine(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike (Channing Tatum) decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women, including an aspiring photographer (Amber Heard) and a diva (Jada Pinkett Smith) from Mike's past(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: Mike Myers is back as the self-styled sexiest spy in the world in this achingly funny sequel. This time Austin goes back to the '60s to trap his nemesis, Dr Evil - but Evil's not the only adversary he must face this time. There's also Evil's scaled-down accomplice Mini-Me, not to mention the grotesque Fat Bastard. Heather Graham co-stars as Austin's squeeze this time around, although there's a blink-and-you'll-miss-it reappearance by Liz Hurley from the first movie and additional appearances from the likes of Robert Wagner and Rob Lowe(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: In Gary Winick's romantic comedy, Kate Hudson and Anne Hathaway star as best friends competing to nab the same location for their wedding reception. When Liv Lerner and Emma Allan were girls they both attended such an impressive wedding at New York's landmark Plaza Hotel that they swore that, when the time came, they too would celebrate their nuptials there. Now, 20 years later, and after saying 'yes' to their respective fiancés, they've instructed their wedding planner to book the ceremony of their dreams. But, a clerical error results in both being given the same slot - and neither is willing to concede. Instead, their friendship is jettisoned as they resort to underhand tactics in a bid to sabotage each other and fulfil their fantasies..(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz, in this hysterical, fast-paced mockumentary(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn, in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex . Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: In an effort to recapture their youth, three disillusioned men start a frat house, then run afoul of the dean. Luke Wilson and Will Ferrell star in this uneven "Animal House" rip-off from director Todd Phillips, who co-wrote the script(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: In Joel Schumacher's taut thriller, told in real time, cynical, smarmy PR man Stu Shepard picks up a ringing phone in a booth in a busy New York street to find a killer on the line. Armed with a high-powered sniper's rifle, the anonymous caller soon proves his prowess and presents Shepard with a choice: convince the police of his story before they shoot him or drop the phone and be shot. His only hope lies in self-abasement and facing up to the truths of his life(n)

programme.title: Traders
programme.desc: A man's business goes under, threatening to derail his posh existence. In a desperate attempt to keep his life as he knows it, he agrees to cash out his entire life savings and put it all on the line in a diabolical, winner-takes-all fight to the death(n)

programme.title: Love and a Bullet
programme.desc: Gun-blazing action and satirical wit nicely blend together in this urban crime drama. Rapper-actor Treach (of the group Naughty by Nature) plays Malik Bishop, a street gangsta who has become a hip and elite hit man. Bishop is hired to slay his boss's innocent girlfriend, but he begins to ruminate on his shady lifestyle when he falls in love with his target. Kent Masters King, Freez Luv(n)

programme.title: Sunshine State
programme.desc: Like Lone Star, Sunshine State is a John Sayles film in which a multitude of characters struggle with the past, both recent and ancient -- both family history and the traumatic past of the land itself. It's set on the fictional Plantation Island in Florida, the history of which is based upon Amelia Island, where the film was actually shot. Lincoln Beach, the once thriving black community on the island, is based on the region's American Beach. Sunshine State portrays a relentless onslaught of real estate developers in the area. Desiree Perry (Angela Bassett, who was also in Sayles' Passion Fish and City of Hope) has returned to Florida for the first time since being sent away as a pregnant teen. She nervously brings her husband, Reggie (James McDaniel of NYPD Blue), an anesthesiologist, to meet her estranged mother, Eunice (Mary Alice). Eunice has recently taken in a troubled teenaged relative, Terrell (newcomer Alexander Lewis). Eunice's friend, Dr. Lloyd (Bill Cobbs), is trying to rally the Lincoln Beach community to slow development. Marly Temple (Edie Falco of The Sopranos, here playing a Southerner) runs the motel owned by her ailing father (Ralph Waite of Waltons fame), but has little interest in the business, and the developers are pressuring her to get her father to sell. She's in the process of ending a relationship with the local golf pro (Marc Blucas from TV's Buffy the Vampire Slayer), when a rather mercenary landscape architect, Jack Meadows (Timothy Hutton), catches her eye. Meanwhile, Francine Pickney (Mary Steenburgen) is so busy organizing the town's cheesy Buccaneer Days festival that she doesn't realize that her husband, Earl (Gordan Clapp, also of NYPD Blue and a Sayles regular) is suicidal. As usual, Sayles wrote, directed, and edited the film, with Maggie Renzi producing(n)

programme.desc: Dee Gives Birth. Dee's blessed event is fast approaching, but the father's identity remains a mystery---to the gang, at least. So they throw a party and invite all of Dee's former flings(n)

programme.desc: Frank's Pretty Woman. Season 7 premiere: Frank wants to marry a prostitute and the gang can't talk him out of it. While Dee sets out to burnish the hooker's heart of gold, Charlie takes a different tack: He tries to set Frank up with another woman. Meanwhile, Mac has put on a lot of weight. "I'm cultivating mass," he tells Dennis(n)

programme.desc: The Gang Goes to the Jersey Shore. Dee and Dennis take the gang to their favourite childhood holiday spot on the Jersey Shore. Things aren't quite as they remember them. Still, Mac, Frank and Charlie have the times of their lives; Dee and Dennis not so much(n)

programme.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
programme.desc: Frank Reynolds' Little Beauties. Frank finds himself in the child beauty-pageant business and fears that people might think that he's in it for the wrong reasons. Meanwhile, Dee wages war on stage mums; and Mac, Dennis and Charlie think they have found a contestant to back(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Training Day. Ineptitude trumps intrigue in a spy spoof focusing on ISIS agent Sterling Archer (voice of H. Jon Benjamin), who has James Bond's vices down pat, if not his virtues. In the opener, Archer must train comptroller Cyril Figgis, who has been promoted to agent by the agency's head---Archer's mother, Malory. Voices...Cyril: Chris Parnell. Malory: Jessica Walter. Agent Lana Kane: Aisha Tyler(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Diversity Hire. Owing to a rash of agent deaths (the result of Sterling's carelessness), ISIS can't meet government diversity standards. Enter the gruffly elegant Conway Stern, an "onyx" agent who wears a Star of David around his neck(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Killing Utne. Malory hosts a dinner party for the UN intelligence chairman, Torvald Utne, in an effort to win a new weapons contract for ISIS. Unfortunately, a group of rival assassins has targeted Mr Utne for elimination(n)

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: A Flight to Remember. In a whole "Titanic" parody, Fry and the entire gang take a space cruise vacation. Leela tells Captain Zapp Brannigan that Fry is her boyfriend, and Amy tells the same thing to her parents. Bender falls in love with a rich female robot. Problems start when the spaceship approaches a black hole(n)

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: Mars University. The Planet Express crew makes a delivery to the Professor's office at Mars University. Realizing that he's just a high school dropout, Fry decides to enroll in school and become a college dropout. He ends up sharing a room with the Professor's super-intelligent experimental monkey, Guenter. Guenter competes with Fry in social activities and academic performance while struggling with whether to rejoin his species in the wild. Meanwhile, Bender hangs out with the robot fraternity of his college days (when he majored in Bending and minored in Robo-American Studies)(n)

programme.title: Futurama

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond try to solve the problems that increasingly complex cars pose to an ageing population. They design a vehicle for elderly people and put it to the test in Dorset with the help of three pensioners. Meanwhile, James May gets acquainted with a revamped Range Rover in London before pitting the luxurious off-roader against an autonomous military machine in Nevada. Actor James McAvoy tackles the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May pay tribute to Saab, the Swedish car manufacturer that created several successful models since the late 1940s, but has now ceased production. Richard Hammond takes the passenger's seat in a Skoda rally car that races a rocket-propelled flying man, and actor Matt Smith gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car. Jeremy also shreds the tyres of the noisy Maserati GranTurismo MC Stradale and the 510bhp Mercedes-Benz C63 AMG Black Series.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson puts the Kia Cee'd through a rigorous but peculiar road test featuring eels, curry, a rock legend, an American police officer and an unusual game of rugby involving James May. Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the Mastretta MXT, but worries about the repercussions of a comment he made in a previous episode about Mexico, the sports car's country of manufacture. Plus, three high-performance hatchbacks are driven with gusto around the test track, and Formula One driver Lewis Hamilton gets a second chance to smash the lap record.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May work on a project to build mobility scooters capable of tackling the British countryside's terrain, and actor Michael Fassbender is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car. Ferrari's four-wheel-drive FF is pitted against the revised, V8-engined Bentley Continental GT on a test track at the edge of the Arctic Circle, while James puts the Fisker Karma through its paces in Florida, and meets AC/DC frontman Brian Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May travel to Beijing to learn about China's car industry, which has seen great expansion in recent years - but also have a violent encounter with one of the Stig's cousins. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond immerses himself in the world of Nascar at a race in Texas, and the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG Roadster is wrestled around the test track, emitting serious amounts of noise and smoke in the process. Future host Matt LeBlanc is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.sub-title: Scrappers - Back in the Yard: With or Without You.
programme.desc: Terry is so fed up he hasn't been to work for a week, so he and Lyndsay decide to try a role swap. However, before long safety issues are testing her patience, and she finds her `softly, softly' approach isn't working. He struggles with making bank payments, and Lyndsay realises the problems are bigger than just Terry's temper, so she persuades him they need a management consultant to help them make fundamental changes.(n)

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.sub-title: Scrappers - Back in the Yard: The Leopard's Spots.
programme.desc: Terry Walker is forced to break the habit of a lifetime when Lyndsay Walker urges him to hire a management consultant, and the first piece of advice the expert delivers is for the short-tempered boss to deliver more praise to his staff. Terry's new approach to management quickly receives its first test when head of HR Dave `Dotcom' reports one member of the team has been drinking on duty - an offense that has already earned him the sack once. With a breathalyser in hand, Terry prepares to have a stern word with his unruly employee. Meanwhile, a neighbouring yard pulls a friendly prank on Metro Salvage, blanketing the site in white powder, so Terry and his boys decide to respond in kind - with paint grenades and pillows.(n)

programme.desc: Chris Packham turns is attention to nature's most hardy survivors, including the penguin, whose wings and body are specially adapted to help conquer a range of habitats.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Dancing in the Dark - The End of Physics?.
programme.desc: Scientists don't know what most of the universe is made of, with atoms accounting for only four per cent of it and the hypothetical dark matter and energy making up the rest. In the wake of an upgrade to the capabilities of Cern's Large Hadron Collider, scientists hoped to identify the nature of dark matter and reveal its secrets. The stakes are high because if the mystery is not solved, it might mean that physics itself needs a rethink.(n)

programme.title: Gorilla Revisited with David Attenborough
programme.desc: The eminent broadcaster and naturalist remembers his encounter with mountain gorillas in Rwanda, recalling how the sequences for the programme Life on Earth were filmed and considering the success of efforts to conserve the great apes.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham turns is attention to nature's most hardy survivors, including the penguin, whose wings and body are specially adapted to help conquer a range of habitats.(n)

programme.title: Resurrection Science
programme.desc: Documentary exploring efforts to sequence the DNA of extinct species including the woolly mammoth and Neanderthal man.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham examines what lies beneath a crocodile's hard exterior, discovering the secret to its ancient history and gaining an insight into one of the most sophisticated physiologies on the planet. By following all stages of a crocodile hunt, Chris reveals how their extraordinary circulatory system enables them to hold their breath for more than an hour, and looks at how their exceptionally sensitive skin detects their prey through water.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Exploring places reclaimed by nature in Detroit and New Orleans, as well as on a Caribbean island.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Can We Make a Star on Earth?.
programme.desc: Despite decades of dedicated work, nuclear fusion researchers have been unable to produce electricity capable of supplying a national grid. This documentary witnesses experimental physicist Brian Cox embark on a global tour to discover whether nuclear fusion is a feasible energy source for the future. On his journey he visits a bomb-testing facility in America, and enters the reaction chamber of South Korea's K-Star - a complex that may hold the key to progress in the field of fusion research.(n)

programme.title: Bears - Spy in the Woods
programme.desc: Camouflaged cameras give an insight into the world of bears around the globe. The animals are filmed in their natural habitats from South America to Alaska as they hunt, scavenge and play, blissfully unaware their every move is being recorded. Narrated by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age Giants
programme.desc: Alice Roberts examines the latest discoveries from the northern hemisphere to shed light on the lives and habitats of the creatures that dominated the planet 40,000 years ago. She begins by heading to North America, which was home to a diverse group of giant mammals, and discovers how the sabre-toothed cat's out-sized teeth were vital for hunting, yet easily broken. Alice looks at evidence of the bear-sized Shasta ground sloth in a cave in the Grand Canyon, and learns about the strange armadillo-like glyptodont - which was the size of a small car.(n)

programme.title: AntiTrust
programme.desc: In this intense techno-thriller, computer wiz Milo Hoffman (Ryan Phillippe) is hired to develop a communications system for a new software company. But the firm's charming CEO (Tim Robbins) has a dark side, and Milo's dream job soon becomes a nightmare, plunging him into a world of intrigue and violence. Rachael Leigh Cook, Claire Forlani(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller a successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realizes that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: The X-Files
programme.desc: The FBI's Mulder and Scully seek the truth about conspiracies, extraterrestrials and killer black ooze in this adaptation of the TV series(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Hancock is a sarcastic, hard-living and misunderstood superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public. When Hancock grudgingly agrees to an extreme makeover from idealistic publicist Ray Embrey, his life and reputation rise from the ashes and all seems right again, until he meets a woman with similar powers to his and the key to his secret past(n)

programme.title: The Natural
programme.desc: Mystical sports fable about a baseball natural who, having had his career cut short by a bizarre twist of fate as a youth, returns to the sport as an adult in order to realise his dreams(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: Every year baseball groupie Annie chooses one player to teach, on and off the diamond. The lucky man usually has the best year of his career. But will it be veteran catcher Crash or young hotshot Nuke?(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: Love and Death. The crown is secure, but there is no peace at court. Elizabeth suffers more emotional turmoil as she loses those closest to her. Margaret Beaufort plans a political marriage to bring Henry home from exile - but has she met her match in Lord Stanley? Anne's marriage made her a traitor, so she is handed into George's care. His motives for keeping her away from court are questioned by Richard, who fears for Anne's safety(n)

Fact-based account of a group of gifted university students who develop a system for card-counting and use it to win big at Las Vegas casinos(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller a successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realizes that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: A comedic grand slam detailing a couple whose romance is threatened by an obsession with the Boston Red Sox(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: The story of a Playboy Bunny who teaches an awkward sorority about the opposite sex - only to learn that what boys really like is what's on the inside. Tossed out of the Playboy Mansion with nowhere to go, Playboy bunny Shelley Darlington is delivered by fate to the sorority girls of Zeta Alpha Zeta, a clueless bunch who stand to lose their house - unless they can learn what only Shelley can teach them(n)

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: John Patrick Shanley's charming screenplay is illuminated by Cher's Oscar-winning performance as a widow who falls for her fiancé's brother(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: Poison and Malmsey Wine. George's anger at losing the Warwick inheritance and his failure to capture the crown resurfaces, with horrific consequences. As the court divides, George openly accuses Elizabeth of witchcraft and Edward of murder. This is treason, and Edward must condemn his own brother to death. Elizabeth finally has revenge on those who killed her father, but it does not bring her comfort(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down high school sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest. Contains strong language/sexual scenes(n)

programme.title: Dead Heist
programme.desc: Hip-hop horror with a host of music stars. Four friends plan the perfect bank job, but while they're clearing the tills, vampiric zombies are clearing the streets and now the gang are trapped(n)

programme.title: The Double O Kid
programme.desc: This youth-oriented actioner centers on a 17-year-old boy whose exceptional video-game-playing ability leads him to become a rookie spy with a mysterious organization that assigns him to get a mysterious package to Los Angeles ASAP. En route, the youth finds himself entangled in a deadly terrorist plot involving his dangerous package(n)

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: This suspense thriller about a daring plot to murder Charles De Gaulle is based on Frederick Forsyth's best-seller. The movie's suspenseful pace is tied to the incredibly careful and intricate planning the man code-named "the Jackal" does in preparation for the hit. This classic was watered down and remade in 1997 as The Jackal(n)

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: The film is about a military genius Gen. George S. Patton and chronicles his World War II campaigns on the European front and in North Africa, and his push into Germany(n)

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Sequel to the 1976 Oscar-winning favourite which catapulted Sylvester Stallone to megastardom. Things are looking grim for the Philadelphia boxer, his wife is in a post-natal coma, and he has an eye injury that could cost him his sight. But his heavyweight-champion rival's pride is still smarting from their first bout, and he wants a rematch with the Italian Stallion(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: (2002) Martin Scorsese's multi-Oscar-nominated epic stars Daniel Day-Lewis as William Cutting, the leader of a violent gang in 19th-century New York who take on their rivals, led by 'Priest' Vallon (Liam Neeson). Vallon dies and his young son Amsterdam disappears, only to return a man (Leonardo DiCaprio) torn between a thirst for revenge and a fascination for the charismatic Cutting, with Cameron Diaz as Jenny Everdeane, the pickpocket they both love. M,W,R,S(n)

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: A serial killer lurks among the trainees in an elite FBI programme(n)

programme.desc: Noble Jinyiwei Qinglong must fight his former allies after an evil eunuch overthrows the Emperor. Now, in order to restore the rightful Emperor to his throne, Qinglong must use his blades to defeat the very assassins he once fought alongside(n)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: Thriller starring Robert Redford as a CIA worker who uncovers some closely-guarded secrets within his own organisation. He is then forced to go on the run from his own colleagues - who now want him dead!(n)

programme.title: Bruce Lee, the Legend
programme.desc: The documentary is a tribute to Bruce Lee, who is a master of martial arts(n)

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Navy flyers try to stop an experimental fighter plane rigged with advanced artificial intelligence from starting World War III(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: John Carpenter's Vampires
programme.desc: Ghoulish horror story about a vampire slayer who leads a contingent of mercenaries in a war against their supernatural enemies. But it is by no means a one-sided contest(n)

programme.title: Bruce Lee, the Legend
programme.desc: The documentary is a tribute to Bruce Lee, who is a master of martial arts(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: The work of international superstar Stephen Chow, Kung Fu Hustle is a humorous, special-effects-filled, action-packed martial arts epic set in early '40s China. A bumbling thief named Sing (Stephen Chow) desires to be the toughest member of the dreaded gangster hit squad known as The Axe Gang, but to completely join the gang he has to commit murder. When Sing attempts to rob a crowded run-down apartment complex known as Pig Sty Alley, the locals begin to defend themselves with some high-flying kung fu skills, and a tiny war erupts between the local masters and the axe-wielding gang. After the gang busts the ancient kung fu king known as The Beast (Leung Siu Lung) out of jail, tensions reach a boiling point as Pig Sty Alley's landlady (Yuen Qiu) leads an all-out attack against the gang and Sing discovers his true heroic fate. Kung Fu Hustle, which set box-office records across Asia during its December 2004 release, also stars Yuen Wah and Xing Yu, and features fight choreography by legendary masters of martial arts cinema Yuen Woo Ping and Sammo Hung(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Michael and the CIA draw closer to discovering Anson's location, and their progress allows them to release Fiona from custody. However, an interfering MI6 agent threatens to put a stop to the operation. Action drama, starring Jeffrey Donovan.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives deal with a case of mistaken identity, which is hampering a major investigation. Meanwhile, Brenda is called to testify in Pope's divorce settlement, but finds that both her career and reputation are at risk. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda races to the scene of three murders, but when she arrives the bodies are nowhere to be found. To solve the case, the team must first locate the victims before the hunt for the killer can begin. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames examine the murder of a mother-of-two. The investigation leads them to a counterfeiting operation and the home of an actor - who puts them on the trail of an important official document. Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames must find concrete evidence to convict a fraudster when they uncover a medical scandal during an investigation into the murders of two pharmaceutical delivery drivers. Detective drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate when naval cryptanalyst Andrew Wells is shot dead in a park outside Baltimore. At the scene, Tony spots a man who was one of his informants from 15 years earlier when he was a police officer, but who went into hiding after a bid to bring down the Russian mobsters he worked for went wrong. Drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team works with Abigail Borin of the Coast Guard Investigative Service after a highly suspicious explosion and fire on board an oil rig kills a US marine corps reservist. Abby detects malware in the platform's computer systems, while Ducky finds traces on the victim's body that lead to a lawyer who works for the oil company. Back in the office, a prankster is bringing some light relief and although the likeliest suspect is Tony, he denies any involvement. Crime drama, guest starring Diane Neal.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the death of a teenager who was due to appear in court to testify that a man convicted of murdering a Korean couple was not actually the culprit. However, several unexpected twists in the case make her wonder whether the boy was really going to tell the truth. Meanwhile, disaster strikes when Pope's ex-wife exposes one of his past relationships. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The wife of a crime boss is murdered in FBI custody. Brenda suspects the agent supposedly protecting her was corrupt and hastily tries to interrogate him before the FBI can regain control of the investigation. As the case unfolds, the team learns today's Mafia do not follow the traditional rules any more. Detective drama series, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the murder of a wealthy businessman's children in his apartment. At first the victims' stepmother seems the most likely culprit, but the team is also suspicious of two nannies with ties to the grieving family. Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The hunt for a missing woman leads Goren and Eames to a political activist's apartment, where they find deadly materials including rat poison - a known bomb-making ingredient. After receiving a chilling video message and questioning a suspect, the detectives soon realise a forthcoming Veteran's Day parade is being targeted.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is forced to take a step back from work when his increasingly frail father Jackson begs him to help track down an old friend from the Second World War who does not have long left to live. Meanwhile, the rest of the team investigate the death of a marine sergeant who appears to have been caught in the crossfire during a bungled robbery, but Tony and Tim find evidence the victim may have been targeted. Crime drama, guest starring Ralph Waite (The Waltons), with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Jody Ray is killed by a hit-and-run driver and evidence points to staff sergeant Justin Dunne, whose guilt seems certain when DiNozzo and McGee find him washing a bloodstained knife when they go to arrest him. However, Dunne tells his lawyer Carrie Clark he was miles away in Falls Church at the time - stabbing bookmaker Donny Sullivan to death. Unable to reveal the truth to the NCIS team, Clark decides to check out the alibi herself. Crime drama, guest starring Salli Richardson-Whitfield (A Town Called Eureka).(n)

programme.title: Prison Break
programme.desc: New series. The US crime thriller returns, picking up with Lincoln years later as he uncovers evidence that suggests his deceased brother Michael may actually be alive.(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Chief Giles helps Kyle pursue a more aggressive strategy to deal with the number of possession cases in Rome, and his efforts see him encounter a new foe.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois befriends local news presenter Joyce Kinney, who asks for permission to film a feature depicting her as the model American housewife. However, the report ends up making her look like a fool, so she sets out to put things right.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and Brian are forced to attend a 12-step AA meeting to kick their drinking habits following a public disturbance. While the dog decides to mend his ways, Peter refuses to admit he has a problem, prompting Death to intervene and show him what his life would be like without alcohol.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Fr Donovan organises a Christmas play at the shopping centre, and casts Stan as Santa Claus and Roger as Jesus - but they land themselves in trouble after getting into a fight with each other. Elsewhere, Hayley and Jeff adopt a child, who turns out to be possessed.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve tries to prove his toughness to Stan by adopting the persona of a superhero, while Francine also goes through an identity crisis when she receives news that could change the family for ever.(n)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life.
programme.desc: The stakes mount ever higher as Rick and his fellow Alexandrians continue to enact their intricate plan to overthrow their oppressors.(n)

programme.title: Mr Pickles
programme.desc: The collie is dog-napped, and a gang of bounty hunters race to collect the reward on his head.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan persuades his last single friend to get married so he can realise his dream of becoming a best man, but when he invites an ex-convict to the wedding, she jeopardises the event. Elsewhere, Ricky Martin causes Roger to doubt himself.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Extended episode in which Brian and Stewie travel to the North Pole to teach Father Christmas a lesson after being snubbed by a mall-based Santa. However, on finding him incapacitated, the pair decide to step into his sleigh and deliver the gifts in his place - but their efforts fall desperately short of the mark.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan creates attractive alter ego Phyllis in a desperate bid to bond with his son, but when he takes things too far, Francine is forced to intervene. Elsewhere, a group of men takes advantage of Roger's new limousine service, prompting him to set out on a manhunt to exact revenge. With the guest voices of Sarah Michelle Gellar and Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: A jealous Francine tries to break up Stan's renewed relationship with a former girlfriend, only to unwittingly leave Roger at the mercy of an alien-hunter. Elsewhere, Steve accidentally wears Hayley's panties to school, and finds they bring him luck.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Sam's girlfriend alleges that her son has stolen a valuable piece of jewellery. Jesse tries to retrieve it, and finds Evan in the midst of packing up to leave town due to a brutal loan shark who is threatening to break his legs unless he steals an 18-wheel truck seemingly filled with black-market liquor. However, they soon learn the vehicle contains something much more dangerous.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the death of a teenager who was due to appear in court to testify that a man convicted of murdering a Korean couple was not actually the culprit. However, several unexpected twists in the case make her wonder whether the boy was really going to tell the truth. Meanwhile, disaster strikes when Pope's ex-wife exposes one of his past relationships. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The wife of a crime boss is murdered in FBI custody. Brenda suspects the agent supposedly protecting her was corrupt and hastily tries to interrogate him before the FBI can regain control of the investigation. As the case unfolds, the team learns today's Mafia do not follow the traditional rules any more. Detective drama series, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the murder of a wealthy businessman's children in his apartment. At first the victims' stepmother seems the most likely culprit, but the team is also suspicious of two nannies with ties to the grieving family. Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The hunt for a missing woman leads Goren and Eames to a political activist's apartment, where they find deadly materials including rat poison - a known bomb-making ingredient. After receiving a chilling video message and questioning a suspect, the detectives soon realise a forthcoming Veteran's Day parade is being targeted.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is forced to take a step back from work when his increasingly frail father Jackson begs him to help track down an old friend from the Second World War who does not have long left to live. Meanwhile, the rest of the team investigate the death of a marine sergeant who appears to have been caught in the crossfire during a bungled robbery, but Tony and Tim find evidence the victim may have been targeted. Crime drama, guest starring Ralph Waite (The Waltons), with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Jody Ray is killed by a hit-and-run driver and evidence points to staff sergeant Justin Dunne, whose guilt seems certain when DiNozzo and McGee find him washing a bloodstained knife when they go to arrest him. However, Dunne tells his lawyer Carrie Clark he was miles away in Falls Church at the time - stabbing bookmaker Donny Sullivan to death. Unable to reveal the truth to the NCIS team, Clark decides to check out the alibi herself. Crime drama, guest starring Salli Richardson-Whitfield (A Town Called Eureka).(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Part one of two. Brenda takes involuntary leave, but ends up assisting an investigation into a murder linked to a terrorist group, while Commander Taylor takes advantage of her enforced layoff to try to break up the PHD. Crime drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Part two of two. Brenda discovers she has been given false information while attempting to find a terrorist-linked suspect. She is forced to untangle a web of deceit to determine who she can trust and prevent the PHD becoming the victims of a sinister plan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate the contract killing of a businessman's wife. Evidence at the scene points to two assailants, one of whom was wearing a bandage, and the victim's mother-in-law becomes the chief suspect. Starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A man admits to killing his father and half-brother, but Goren and Eames discover he had been heavily influenced by a self-improvement guru. The detectives are forced to take an unorthodox approach to discover whether the chief suspect was coerced into carrying out the murders.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An internal security breach forces NCIS to go into lockdown when a covert listening device is found in a pen belonging to Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter. DiNozzo discovers that National Security Agency analyst Ellie Bishop wrote a report two years previously predicting the possibility of such an occurrence and she is brought in to assist with the investigation and track down the culprit. Guest starring Leslie Hope and Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when marine corporal Flegman is found shot to death, and a phone leads them to a hotel room where Gibbs awkwardly stumbles upon his ex-wife Diane Sterling and her FBI agent ex-husband TC Fornell. She had been attempting to call her boyfriend Eddie to break up with him, but somehow Flegman had taken possession of his phone. The team tracks down Eddie's car and discovers a clown nose along with traces of blood and he quickly becomes the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: The Old Girl. Sabrina's new pal happens to be Jimmy's ex-girlfriend who broke his heart when they were teens(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Canvassing. Leslie embarks on a door-to-door campaign, hoping to build support for the park project, while Tom resorts to more questionable tactics(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: The Reporter. Leslie gets a newspaper reporter to do a story about her and the park idea, but becomes upset when she finds out that the reporter slept with Mark(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Boys' Club. Leslie faces an ethical dilemma when she tries to break into the "old boys' club" of politics. Elsewhere, Andy plans a surprise for Ann(n)

programme.title: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
programme.desc: President Abraham Lincoln moonlights as a vampire hunter after learning that his mother was killed by bloodsuckers in this supernatural action thriller(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: A former warrior (Luke Evans) surrenders his soul in order to save his family in this Dracula origins story. Action horror with Dominic Cooper and Charles Dance. (2014)(88 mins)(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: Evil forces threaten the peace of Middle-earth. Dark riders from Sauron search for the ring which will give him absolute power. And Frodo Baggins, nephew of dragon-hunting Bilbo, must take the ring on a quest to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: All's Fair in Oven War. Bart adopts a 1970s "Playdude" lifestyle when he finds Homer's old girlie mags. Meanwhile, Lisa catches Marge cheating in the Ovenfresh Bakeoff. Guest starring James Caan as himself(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Girl Who Slept Too Little
programme.desc: The Girl Who Slept Too Little. Springfield's graveyard is moved... to right outside Lisa's bedroom window. Terrified, she decides to confront her fears and spend a night in the cemetery(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge Gamer. Marge goes online for the first time and becomes obsessed with a role-playing game that Bart and many of their neighbours are playing. Meanwhile, Lisa develops her own obsession---for soccer---and Homer becomes a referee(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Little Orphan Millie. Milhouse's parents re-marry and go on a honeymoon cruise but their boat capsizes and they are presumed dead. Milhouse acquires a new macho attitude to life that quickly wins him friends(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Peeping Mom. Bart's tall tale about not being involved in a bulldozer accident is a doozy, but a skeptical Marge decides to dog him all over the place until he 'fesses up. Meanwhile, Flanders gets a new dog which leads Homer to overlook Santa's Little Helper(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gal of Constant Sorrow. Bart accidentally deposits a homeless woman's cart into the river, and to make amends, he lets her move into his closet for a slight fee, and when Lisa discovers her there, she finds out the lady is a wonderful folk singer, but that she has some violence and substance-abuse skeletons in her closet. Meanwhile, not-so-handy Homer traps the cat in the walls of the house(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Waverly Hills, 9021-D'Oh. After catching Bart and Mrs Krabappel counting Zs at their desks, Marge confronts Principal Skinner about Springfield Elementary's slipping standards and finds out that the school is floundering at the bottom of the ranks. An appalled Marge decides to rent a cheap apartment in upmarket Waverly Hills so the kids can receive a better education(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Thursdays with Abie. An ambitious journalist takes great interest in Grampa's life stories. But a suspicious Homer soon discovers that he'll do anything for a good story..(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Skorpio. Malory chooses Lana over Archer for a mission to Saint-Tropez to take out an international arms dealer, and she accompanies Lana there as well---for a "conference" that turns out to be a tryst with her KGB paramour, Nikolai. But soon, Archer is heading for the arms dealer's yacht as well. Back at ISIS headquarters, Cyril is worried sick about Lana's safety (not to mention her fidelity)(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Skytanic. A bomb threat jeopardizes a luxury airship's maiden voyage, sending the ISIS crew into action(n)

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: When twins sisters meet for the first time at summer camp, they decide it is high time their estranged parents got back together again, and hatch an ingenious plan to reunite them by swapping places with each other. Disney comedy, starring Hayley Mills in a dual role as both sisters, alongside Maureen O'Hara, Brian Keith and Leo G Carroll.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
programme.desc: A boy starts a new school determined to be popular and admired, only to find himself instead a target for bullies. He documents his experiences in a journal as he sets out on a series of attempts to gain the respect he feels he deserves - but his every effort ends in disaster. Family comedy, with Zachary Gordon, Robert Capron and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: An advertising executive tries to start a new life in California with his family and their lumbering, disaster-prone Great Dane. The friendly but clumsy dog accidentally causes chaos for his owners, until an incident at a surfing competition makes him a local celebrity. Comedy, with Lee Pace, and featuring the voice of Owen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The teenage detective and his future sidekick Watson meet for the first time at boarding school. The death of Holmes's mentor sets the youngsters on their first case, and they discover that former members of an archaeological survey team have died under suspicious circumstances - pointing to a sinister Egyptian cult using hallucinogenic poisons to kill its victims. Adventure, starring Nicholas Rowe, Alan Cox and Sophie Ward.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Telepathic mutant Charles Xavier forms the first generation of the superhero team in the 1960s. Their battle with a Nazi war criminal manipulating the world toward nuclear war gradually drives a wedge between Xavier and his ally Magneto, leading them to become deadly enemies. Superhero adventure prequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night
programme.desc: Premiere. The residents of a quiet Iranian town go about their daily business, little realising they are being stalked by a deadly and alluring female vampire. One boy, who dreams of escaping the place, crosses her path - an encounter that will change his life forever. Horror, starring Sheila Vand, Arash Marandi and Marshall Manesh. In Farsi.(n)

programme.title: The Girl Next Door
programme.desc: A bookish teenager is far more concerned with academic achievement than having fun, until he is smitten by a gorgeous newcomer to the neighbourhood. However, when her colourful past in the adult movie business comes to light, he is convinced it is his mission to turn the former porn star into prom queen material. Romantic comedy, starring Emile Hirsch, Elisha Cuthbert, Timothy Olyphant and James Remar.(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: An American couple decide their son needs a brother, and plan to adopt another child - but when they get to the orphanage they are greeted by a charming talking mouse named Stuart, who fits the bill perfectly. However, their jealous cat hatches a plot to get rid of the new arrival. Comedy adventure, starring Geena Davis and Hugh Laurie, with the voice of Michael J Fox.(n)

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into a forest that her scientist father believes is home to a race of miniature people. She stumbles on the tiny creatures and is shrunk down to their size so she can carry out a quest to save their new queen from an invading army. Animated adventure, with the voices of Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, Colin Farrell and Christoph Waltz.(n)

programme.title: Song of the Sea
programme.desc: Premiere. The last surviving member of a race of magical seal-children seeks the aid of her human brother for a special quest. The two of them set out on a journey to revive the seal's magical powers and prevent the spirit world from being lost forever. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Lucy O'Connell, David Rawle and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: A clumsy 25-year-old would-be reporter is given the chance to prove herself when she is sent on an assignment to get an inside take on high-school life. However, when she falls for an English teacher, she has trouble maintaining the facade of a calm and sophisticated young lady, as all the bad memories of her awkward younger days come flooding back. Romantic comedy, with Drew Barrymore, Michael Vartan and David Arquette.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Secret agent Ethan Hunt sent to find and destroy the only sample of a deadly man-made virus. However, he faces tough opposition in a former spy-turned-criminal mastermind who has already acquired the cure and now wants the pathogen itself. Director John Woo's action thriller sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandie Newton and Anthony Hopkins.(n)

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: John McClane goes to Russia having received word that his estranged son Jack is in trouble with the law. He is surprised to discover Jack is secretly a CIA agent, and father and son join forces to take on the Russian Mob, who are engaged in a plot to steal nuclear weapons. Action adventure sequel, starring Bruce Willis and Jai Courtney.(n)

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A rancher seizes the chance to settle his debts and earn his son's respect by agreeing to escort a notorious outlaw to the town of Contention, where a train will take the prisoner to jail. But the journey takes a dangerous turn when the criminal tries to manipulate the rancher into letting him go - while his henchmen lie in wait. Western remake, starring Russell Crowe, Christian Bale and Gretchen Mol.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Marlene discovers the farmhands concocting a virility potion for Rocky the bull, and manages to sneak a dose into Boycie's coffee. Make-up is found in Tyler's room, and his parents are relieved to be told he has a girlfriend - until it transpires she is also his teacher. John Challis, Sue Holderness and Jack Doolan star.(n)

programme.title: Butterflies
programme.desc: Contemplation of her own mortality leaves Ria feeling she wants to do more with her life, so she ends her relationship with Leonard. Comedy, starring Wendy Craig and Bruce Montague.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.sub-title: The Primal Scene, So to Speak.
programme.desc: Tim chances upon the extra-marital affair of a local businessman, who offers the mummy's boy a contract to write a book and a large sum of money to keep quiet.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean accepts Lionel's proposal, but their happiness is not shared by everyone. Sandy walks out on her boyfriend while Stephen tries to organise a surprise party for Penny.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: Bob and Thelma throw a surprise party to cheer up Terry - but the blindfolded guest of honour begins to insult old friends, unaware they are listening to his every word.(n)

programme.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Pet
programme.desc: A British detective turns up looking for Moxey, and a vengeful Grainger tries to prevent the lads completing their reconstruction of the bridge - but Oz lures the upper-crust crook to America, where he finally gets his comeuppance. Drama, starring Tim Healy, Timothy Spall, Kevin Whately, Christopher Fairbank and Jimmy Nail.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Del-Boy embarks on a new romance with Raquel, an actress he meets through a computer dating agency, while Rodney takes `Nervous Nerys' out for a burn in the three-wheeler - but as ever with the Peckham twosome, nothing goes quite according to plan. Christmas special from 1988, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Three Men, a Woman and a Baby.
programme.desc: Rodney and Albert begin to worry the flat will get overcrowded as the birth of Del-Boy Jr approaches, while Del feels well prepared for fatherhood thanks to a stint at antenatal classes with Raquel. Starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean accepts Lionel's proposal, but their happiness is not shared by everyone. Sandy walks out on her boyfriend while Stephen tries to organise a surprise party for Penny.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: Bob and Thelma throw a surprise party to cheer up Terry - but the blindfolded guest of honour begins to insult old friends, unaware they are listening to his every word.(n)

programme.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Pet
programme.desc: A British detective turns up looking for Moxey, and a vengeful Grainger tries to prevent the lads completing their reconstruction of the bridge - but Oz lures the upper-crust crook to America, where he finally gets his comeuppance. Drama, starring Tim Healy, Timothy Spall, Kevin Whately, Christopher Fairbank and Jimmy Nail.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Foggy finds an interest in camcorders, much to the annoyance of some country ramblers. When later playing his footage back on Pearl's video machine, it becomes apparent the lens has inadvertently caught her and Howard in a compromising situation. Brian Wilde stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: When Auntie Wainwright forces a gigantic tractor wheel on the trio, Foggy decides to craft a vehicle out of it. However, in doing so he manages to prove that the invention of the wheel might not have been such a good idea after all. Bill Owen, Peter Sallis and Brian Wilde star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Foggy ropes Compo and Clegg into reconstructing a battle when a pit at a building site brings back memories of his wartime exploits. Comedy, starring Brain Wilde and Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Hapless uncle Bryn organises a special treat for Gwen's birthday. However, his supposedly covert actions do not go as unnoticed as he would like, and an unexpected guest arrives. Meanwhile, Stacey tries to summon the courage to tell Gavin of her big decision.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: The newlyweds begin leading separate lives back in their home towns. In Essex, Smithy makes efforts to remind Gavin of the excitement of his bachelor years with a traditional boys' night out. Meanwhile in Barry, Stacey tries to distract herself with a trip to the bingo.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Nessa goes into labour a month early in Barry, and the newlyweds must forget their differences to track down Smithy in time for the birth of his child. Meanwhile, Stacey returns to Essex to salvage her marriage.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright attends a former customer's funeral, leaving Granville in charge of the store. However, the miserly shopkeeper has difficulty trusting his nephew to run it properly. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and David Jason.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright's day turns into a nightmare when Nurse Gladys Emmanuel has a problem with her washing machine. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Lynda Baron.(n)

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: The Royles look forward to a joyous celebration in honour of Antony's 18th birthday, complete with a football-pitch cake. But as the house fills up with family and friends, the hi-fi breaks down - prompting some home-brewed entertainment.(n)

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: Denise and Dave bring baby David to visit and Anthony and Darren do Ali G impressions. Award-winning comedy, starring Caroline Aherne.(n)

programme.title: Gimme Gimme Gimme
programme.desc: Linda plans a surprise party for Tom's 30th birthday, but the guest list leaves a lot to be desired - and that's before Bucks Fizz get involved. Comedy, starring Kathy Burke and James Dreyfus.(n)

programme.title: Gimme Gimme Gimme
programme.desc: Tom and Linda go out clubbing and get very drunk, leading to one of them spending the night with a security guard and the other with a woman. Meanwhile, Beryl goes back to soliciting. Kathy Burke and James Dreyfus star.(n)

programme.title: Little Britain
programme.desc: Sir Norman Fry is forced to explain an embarrassing incident with a glace cherry in Little Fumble. Vicky Pollard proves hopelessly inept in her new career as a babysitter and Mr Mann tries on an unusual costume at the fancy-dress shop. Comedy sketches, guest starring comedian and writer David Baddiel and Big Top's Ruth Madoc.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Jeremy joins a band, but insists he is not going to be their roadie. Mark tries to forget Sophie by stalking shop assistant April - which results in him pretending to be signed up to the same history course as her. Offbeat comedy, starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.desc: Goldie, Jordan, Simon Day and Johnny Vegas guest on the comedy quiz show, chaired by madcap duo Vic Reeves and Bob Mortimer, with captains Ulrika Jonsson and Will Self.(n)

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Marlene discovers the farmhands concocting a virility potion for Rocky the bull, and manages to sneak a dose into Boycie's coffee. programme.title: Butterflies
programme.desc: Everyone feels the effects when Adam's girlfriend breaks up with him. Comedy, starring Wendy Craig and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.desc: The local amateur dramatic society's production of Hamlet and a mysterious disappearance leads Timothy to suspect his mother has been romantically involved with his uncle.(n)

programme.desc: The announcement of Jean and Lionel's wedding date gives the neighbourhood women the perfect opportunity to go shopping for new outfits - until the bride-to-be is accused of shoplifting. Comedy, with Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Auntie Wainwright gives the boys a gas grill, but they have difficulty working out how the pressure valve works, bringing an explosive touch to their barbecue. Peter Sallis, Bill Owen, Brian Wilde and Robert Fyfe star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Compo and Foggy drink too much home brew at Ernie Mordue's funeral, resulting in bad hangovers for both of them. Bill Owen and Brian Wilde star.(n)

programme.sub-title: Have You Got a Light Mate?.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Blanco ends up in the prison hospital, where he fears he is about to shuffle off this mortal coil and entrusts the whereabouts of his stashed fortune to fellow inmate Fletch, who is sharing a ward with him. Comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and David Jason.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Dodgy dealer Del gets his hands on a consignment of self-inflating rubber dolls, which turn out to be filled with explosive gas. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: A retired jeweller offers Del-Boy the deal of a lifetime - then suddenly has a heart attack and gets taken to hospital with a briefcase containing 250 cut-price gold necklaces still chained to his wrist. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Henry IX
programme.desc: New series. Comedy starring Charles Edwards as a king who has a crisis of confidence and tries to modernise the monarchy - despite the objections of his family. With Sally Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: The hotel is plunged into chaos by the death of a guest, leading to all manner of mayhem as Basil tries to conceal the corpse from the other occupants. Classic comedy, guest starring Geoffrey Palmer, with John Cleese and Prunella Scales.(n)

programme.title: Little Britain
programme.desc: Dafydd has a big decision to make - stay at home as the only gay in the village, or travel to London and risk becoming one of the crowd. Florence agonises over whether to hang up her crinolines, Linda receives hassle from the students, and Mrs Emery has knee trouble - causing a stomach-churning consultation for the doctor. Imelda Staunton guest stars in a Christmas special from 2005.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Sophie tells Mark she and Jeff are moving in together, and the blow is compounded when she reveals she has been asked her to spend less time with him. programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here
programme.desc: John Catucci eats pizzas and burgers in Burlington, heads to Toronto's Hogtown Cure and then dashes to Boston for a great big lobster roll.(n)

programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here
programme.desc: John Catucci visits Hungry Hollow in Georgetown, Ontario, for a barbecue, and learns the secrets to authentic Napoletana pizza.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Another chance to see the 2012 contest, as presenters Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins invite 12 enthusiastic bakers to take part in a contest to determine which of them is Britain's best amateur, facing challenges devised by judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood. To begin with, they tackle an upside down cake, before following Paul's recipe for rum babas, a hybrid of cake and enriched dough that baffles some of the competitors. Finally, they are challenged to produce a show-stopping cake that reveals a hidden design when sliced into. Who will be first to leave?.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: The finalists visit Modena in Italy, where they are challenged to work under chef patron Massimo Bottura at the three Michelin-starred Osteria Francescana. They are then put in charge of two dishes each as they cook the restaurant's six-course tasting menu for the judges and a selection of guests, before returning to the MasterChef kitchens to prepare a dish influenced by their experiences.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers revisit the 1970s, a decade which is all too often unfairly stigmatised for its food. They show how a well-prepared chicken cordon bleu and banoffee pie can be a contemporary gastronomic delight, before heading to a restaurant whose menu harks back to that era.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood's Bread
programme.desc: The master baker demonstrates breads that can be made in under an hour and don't require kneading or proving, making a classic wholemeal soda bread topped with a cheesy Irish rarebit. He also rustles up stout bread with smoked salmon pate and shows how a simple scone recipe can transform a stew into a beef cobbler.(n)

programme.title: James Martin's United Cakes of America
programme.desc: James's road trip to discover the best cakes, buns and fabulous bakes in America continues in Philadelphia, where he makes a fire and ice cake and searches for a pumpple dessert, which is made with sweet pies inside.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul
programme.desc: The chef's gastronomic road trip from Venice to Istanbul through the countries of the former Byzantine Empire is nearing its end as he leaves southern Greece for the shores of western Turkey. On the Cesme Peninsula Rick enjoys creamy Armola cheese matured in goat skins, Urla's famous red wine and the ultimate Turkish breakfast. He also cooks the country's iconic dish sultan's delight - a mouth-watering lamb stew on a bed of aubergine puree.(n)
